sentences.en: Back at the tourist center in Tysfjord I talked to the Dutchman " instrumentalist . "
sentences.cn: 回到提斯峡湾的旅游服务中心,我和那个荷兰的 [ 乐手 ] 聊了一下.

sentences.en: It contains the variable melody and abundant emotion of instrumentalist.
sentences.cn: 它包含了多变的旋律和演奏者丰富的感情.

sentences.en: She is also friends with the rock singer and instrumentalist Steve Winwood, and they have sometimes performed together.
sentences.cn: 她也和摇滚歌手，乐器演奏家史蒂夫．温伍德交上了朋友，他们有时还一起进行表演。

sentences.en: The others acknowledge him as their most talented instrumentalist as he can play all the reed instruments, piano and trumpet.
sentences.cn: 其他人认为他就是他们中最有天分的乐器演奏家，因为他能够演奏所有的簧乐器、钢琴和喇叭。

sentences.en: This platform allowed him to showcase his countless talents as a songwriter, arranger, instrumentalist, and vocalist.
sentences.cn: 这个平台让他展示的是一位作曲家, 编曲家, 演奏家,他无数人才, 和歌手.
